name: Richard M. MAHER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE; Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
